Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Received my new camera a couple of days before my first trip to Alaska. Even though I knew very little about how to use it I was able to take some remarkable pictures.  It is light, fits my small hand very well, and easy to hold for long periods of time.  I recommended it to several people on the trip who were just as amazed by some of the shots I was able to get as I was.

Reviews.Title: Great kit and an excellent deal for such a nice camera
Reviews.Author: Elias Lindenberg
Reviews.Content: Fantastic Deal and great camera. Haven't used all of the kit yet but very pleased about what we've used thus far. First and foremost, camera is sweet (and light) and very easy to travel with. (BTW, i'm a novice and this is my first DSLR)

Reviews.Title: easy to use and high quality! Extra lenses are nice too!
Reviews.Author: nitehawk
Reviews.Content: My mom loves it! Seems easy to use and takes great pics! She really likes using the bigger lens so having an extra is nice!

Reviews.Title: Great bundle
Reviews.Author: Aditya Ghosh
Reviews.Content: The SL1 is so small and easy to hold, great also for Asian folks with smaller hands... the bundle packs in quite a punch, and over all, great value for money, especially for beginner photographers...

Reviews.Title: This is the camera
Reviews.Author: Tudor
Reviews.Content: I have owned several cameras over the years, this is by far the lightest and BEST camera for the money. we took several hundreds shots for a wedding and they all turned out fantastic. We are very pleased with this camera. Great company and super fast delivery

Reviews.Title: Camera works! But other things do not
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: The tripod was broken on arrival. The camera mount would come off whenever i try to raise it. The wireless shutter control could not be detected by the camera. The memory card lost a lot of our photos while transferring. Overall the camera works great but other things shipped with it are of low quality.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Miren
Reviews.Content: Light weight & small. I love the picture clarity as well. I have used t3i & t4i , this one is much lighter & smaller. I just love it.Shipping is also fast , I got it on 3rd business day.

Reviews.Title: Best purchase made in a while!
Reviews.Author: Sarah Taylor
Reviews.Content: I'm over the moon happy with this purchase. The package is worth it with 2 high quality lenses, in addition to high quality tripod, camera bag, memory card, and lens cleaning kit. I'm in love with the camera which fits my hand perfectly and is extremely light weight. We just took this camera with us to Disney World and it captured our memories perfectly.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: william girard
Reviews.Content: i liked it hard to get used to but a very fine camera would recommended it for any photo buff

Reviews.Title: Promises fullfilled
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: Everything is as advertised; awesome! Works and functions as advertised. Awesome camera and it came with a spare battery. Love it!

Reviews.Title: Simple to use, great results
Reviews.Author: Susan L. Winslow
Reviews.Content: This kit includes everything you need to start taking great photos.  We did a lot of research to find a camera that could deliver on quality photos, including action shots, and yet be very simple to use.  The 50-250 mm lens worked great at capturing action hockey photos.  We are very pleased with our decision to purchase this kit.

Reviews.Title: Light weight, compact and loaded with features
Reviews.Author: John Isaacs
Reviews.Content: It arrived in good order, everything in good shape and as advertised. Remember the camera body and lenses are Canon but everything else is third party, but it all works fine and I've had no problems. good price for the package. Camera is light weight and compact, loaded with features, and just what I wanted, my first DSLR but I've had other digital cameras. The instructions included are a bit slim so it might be a good idea to get a book, like David Busch's or the 'Dummies' book because you probably want to use more than the FullAuto Mode to get the most out of the camera.

Reviews.Title: Huge value package
Reviews.Author: broncohall
Reviews.Content: This package was incredible. It has everything you could need from novice to experienced user in a price that beat everyone else including the big box stores. I'm very pleased

Reviews.Title: i appreciated this purchases
Reviews.Author: chenjun
Reviews.Content: I have taken thousands pics with this good stuff.the delivering time is more quick than i image.i am pleased with this.
